title: Shoghi：关于iOS版上的文件共享
author: BensonQC
txt_content:
Shoghi：
Once Minecraft: PE 0.11.0 is released on iOS (no date yet!) it'll support File Sharing so you'll be able to backup worlds directly on iTunes
Shoghi：
一旦Minecraft: PE 0.11.0在iOS平台上发布（目前仍无确切日期），它将会支持文件共享，所以你将能直接在iTunes上备份世界。

replies.author: Goodlucky31
replies.txt_content: 可惜我的苹果账户没钱，至今还没买

replies.author: WindowPain
replies.txt_content: 这个功能很实用呢！希望安卓也有类似的功能！
